work.summary: summar.ee makes voice messages communication easy and convenient. It trascribes, translates and summarizes voice messages using OpenAI's Whisper/ChatGPT and the DeepL API. The service is available on Telegram
work.name: summar.ee
highlights: OpenAI Whisper/ChatGPT for voice message transcription, translation and summarization
Telegram integration using python-telegram-bot and telethon for large file transfer using MTProto
DeepL API for translation
PostgreSQL and SQLAlchemy as the database backend
CI/CD workflow using Github Actions

work.summary: urlwiz.io is a search engine for domains that are for sale. It uses vector search to find the best results in over 1000000 listings based on a project description
work.name: Domain Wizard
highlights: OpenAI ChatGPT for computing embeddings for domains and project descriptions
Next.js frontend with TailwindCSS
PostgreSQL with pgvector and SQLAlchemy as the database backend for fast vector search
FastAPI backend
Stripe payment integration
Highly memory efficient ETL pipeline for updating the domain database
CI/CD workflow using Github Actions

work.summary: Odoo is an open-source software company offering a modular suite of business applications, including ERP, CRM, e-commerce, and accounting. Its flexible, user-friendly platform serves businesses of all sizes, with both a free community version and a feature-rich enterprise version available.
work.name: Odoo - Professional Services
highlights: development & maintenance of custom-tailored client solutions
design, evaluation and implementation of code & database migrations with a focus on high-avalability and performance
consulation and support of clients in the implementation of Odoo modules
Backend: Python, PostgreSQL, Docker, Github, odoo.sh
Frontend: Javascript, HTML, CSS, XML, QWeb

work.summary: Imagine2030 is a platform for people who want to develop solutions for the climate crisis - with a focus on sustainable mobility and renewable energies.
work.name: Imagine 2030 mobility accelerator
highlights: development and evaluation of innovative business ideas
agile methods, design thinking, lean startup
entrepreneurship, evaluation of business models & ideas
user-centric development based on export and customer interviews
presentation and communication
